availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Polly Allen Swinney in Meade County, Kentucky, on November 25, 1844. Father of John Swinney, Susan Swinney, Amanda Swinney, E. F. Swinney, Courtney Swinney, Josiah Swinney, Merritt Swinney, Jr., and Maria Swinney. Farmer in Hardin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Meade County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, District 3, p. 378A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, p. 458.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, District 4, p. 335B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Meade County Marriages, Film 000390.
